task.title: Exporting connector projects to RAR files
task.shortdesc: You can export a connector project to a RAR file in preparation for deploying it to a server.

context.p: To export the contents of a connector project to a RAR file:

step.cmd: In the J2EE perspective, click File Export.
Under Select an export destination, click J2EERAR file.
In the Connector module list, select the connector project to export.
In the Destination field, enter the full path and RAR file name where you want to export the connector project.
To export source files, select the Export source files check box.
If you are exporting to an existing RAR file and you do not want to be warned about overwriting it, select Overwrite existing file

taskbody.result: The wizard exports the contents of the RAR project to the specified RAR file.
